markdown:
[ Resonant Rhythm ](https://resonantrhythm.com/resonant-rhythm-website/home)
[ Resonant Rhythm ](https://resonantrhythm.com/resonant-rhythm-website/home)
# You were born to make music that counts.
## Whether you've been at it for years or are newer to the game,sometimes a track just doesn't sound like you want it to.
### Maybe your song sounds stellar in the studio but not on your phone or in the car.
### Perhaps you want to emulate a specific sound, but no matter how much you tweak things, you just can’t emulate it
### You started out your production process inspired, but something is missing that you can't put your finger on.
### And now you've listened to your song so many times you can no longer hear what needs improving.
### All of the above can be crushingly disappointing and frustrating.
### Perhaps you've sent your song to a label, only to have a reply with: "It's not quite there" or "It's not the right fit for us."
# Let's Finish Your Song
#### I'm Keith, the face behind Resonant Rhythm, and I know what it feels like to get stuck in your creative process when crafting a hit song and not know what steps to take next.
#### 
Whether you want
#### help with mixing and mastering, 
#### an extra set of ears, 
#### or you need a boost in confidence 
#### to send your track off to your dream label, Resonant Rhythm helps musicians
####  complete their music with absolute excellence by tapping into the heart behind it and capturing in a way to move their listeners.
#  Polish & Release in Just a Few Weeks.
The power of music to move the soul and speak to our emotions
is so mighty that just one song can create significant change in the world. 
With Resonant Rhythm's music finishing service, 
I come alongside artists and offer my ear 
and feedback to help artists finish tracks at their highest potential. 
Together, we identify the roadblocks holding them back,
then I coach the artist and make suggestions to help them complete their mix.
We then master the track until it's ready to be taken to a label or self-released.
You can also get support with mixing as an additional service if you need it.
# 
Resonant Rhythm's
Finishing Service
Go back to the basics of the original vision for your song
Polish your song's intro to a catchy label-worthy standard
Master the track until you're entirely happy with it
### Walk Away With
### 
A finished
Fully-Mastered
Hit Song
Ready to Send to Labels or to be Self-Released
##  Is the Right Fitfor You If:
You want a personalized service 
with a professional audio engineer with over ten years of experience & exceptional technical expertise.
You're ready to swap feelings of 
frustration for elation, 
finish that hit song, 
and get it into the hands of a record label.
Musicians need tailored-to-them support
to release their unique sound into the world.
A holistic approach to finishing music 
means a focus on the
vision behind the song-in-progress.
Resonant Rhythm will help you 
create that next hit with
authenticity and meaning.
We'll meet virtually and evaluate your track 
using the best industry-standard audio equipment.
Then, throughout several remote sessions together, 
you'll receive feedback from my well-trained ear.
I'll coach you to implement changes 
until the production is 100% complete 
and you have a signable track
that you're wholeheartedly proud of.
With Resonant Rhythm, 
you get more than just another
conveyor-belt mediocre track.
Together, let's harness your vision 
for the music that resonates
with you & make it a reality
on playlists worldwide!
[ START YOUR PROJECT ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
#  How We Bring Your Music
# to Life
Resonant Rhythm supports musicians at every stage of their creative journey.
Click on the stage of production you're currently going through for a guide that will spark your inspiration and propel you forward!
[ Idea / Producing ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Arranging and Ear Candy ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Mixing / Mastering ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Choosing a Label or Self-Releasing ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
##### You're just one click away from 
##### breaking up with overwhelm & creative frustration
& just a few short weeks away from 
your final masterpiece.
##### Just imagine how you'll feel 
when you press play 
and those melodies roll out.
##### From the chime of the first note of the intro
#####  through to the punchy vocals, 
##### your chart-topping song will get you (and your friends) 
#####  dancing around your kitchen.
##### And YOU wrote it. It's YOUR song.
##### All you needed was a little steering in the right direction.
# Ready to finishthat track
# turn it into a signable hit today?
[ START YOUR PROJECT ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
'It's unbelievable how much the song has improved. Everything is much more intense, feels really expanded on the high end but the low end is still in the middle as I like. Somehow I think now I really understand what you meant you could do with the bass, like round it you said. I have been testing it in different sound systems, and I really love it.'
##  Who's behindResonant Rhythm?
##### I'm Keith,
##### a music-infatuated
#####  post-production technical director, 
##### audio engineer, and entrepreneur.
##### I possess an uncanny intuition for anything electronic, and I help artists create music that resonates with their audience.
Throughout my career, I have seen countless creatives stop short of their potential due to hurdles and knocked confidence at the finishing stage of their music.
I help musicians succeed by offering my ear and feedback, technical troubleshooting, 
and advice regarding the various aspects 
of the music production process.
Believe me when I say you absolutely CAN confidently release that record as a polished, finished masterpiece. The world needs your music!
In the same way that all musicians 
release unique sounds,
I also understand that artists 
have different needs, timescales, goals, 
and styles of working.
I always meet artists where they are at and take the time to get to know the whole story behind their music. 
When we work together I show you the necessary steps to complete your music so you can add them to your skillset and continue using them yourself moving forward.
## Why Work with me?
  * My primary goal is to produce music of outstanding quality
  * Benefit from a wealth of experience across countless music genres
  * Get bespoke support tailored to YOUR creative needs 
  * Collaborate with an industry-lead technical and musical professional
  * Throughout all my years in music production, there’s not much I haven't seen in terms of roadblocks to perfecting that final mix (I also know because I've been there myself). 
  * you're just one step away from getting the helping hand you need to help you overcome those hurdles and finally finish that song.


'I couldn't be happier with Keith's service. He provided me with very positive and in-depth feedback on my latest song, which has been incredibly helpful in improving my craft. He took the time to understand my needs and personal preferences, which made the experience feel personalized and tailored to my specific goals.'
## Ready to make the leap?
Whatever your goal, Resonant Rhythm is ready to help you reach it- YOUR way. Let's work together and help you become a signed artist for your dream label today.
[ BOOK A CALL ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
'I highly recommend Keith's services to anyone looking to improve their music. He is a skilled professional who truly cares about his clients, and I am grateful for the guidance he provided me.'
#### What happens after we have our initial call?
You’ll share your track and vision with me during our first call.
If we’re a good fit to move forward, I’ll send you a contract and details to make the first payment.
Then I'll provide a detailed document of feedback for you to get started.
#### What if I don't feel ready to improve my track yet?
There is no time like the present! 
Often, the reason we don't feel ready to take action is because we don't have clear next steps. 
It's easy to start a project- to complete it is the real victory.
So, if you're prepared to take a leap of faith and work together, you'll soon feel confident and excited because you'll see what's truly possible for your music.
#### How long does it take to complete a song?
On average, at a steady pace, a song takes around one month from start to finish, completing the required step once per week.
However, if you have a deadline, we can complete your track as quickly as one week!
Because I want to work with dedicated musicians, there is a six-month re-start fee to protect my time and capacity in the contract.
#### What if I never like my song?!
If after giving everything to a track, you just can’t fall in love with it, I'll offer 50% off the initial payment of a new contract to start over on a brand new record.
#### What's your refund policy?
If after the first round of written feedback, you are not satisfied then I will refund the initial payment.
Once the project moves beyond this stage no refund will be issued as my time has been invested. 
If you cancel before the end of the finishing process, you simply will not receive the final master.
[ START YOUR PROJECT ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
Your cart is empty [Continue](https://resonantrhythm.com/store)

      FAQ
    
  
              
      
  
      
          

              
                  
      What happens after we have our initial call?
    
  
              
                  
              
                  
      You’ll share your track and vision with me during our first call. If we’re a good fit to move forward, I’ll send you a contract and details to make the first payment. Then I'll provide a detailed document of feedback for you to get started.
    
  
              

              
                  
      What if I don't feel ready to improve my track yet?
    
  
              
                  
      There is no time like the present! Often, the reason we don't feel ready to take action is because we don't have clear next steps. It's easy to start a project- to complete it is the real victory. So, if you're prepared to take a leap of faith and work together, you'll soon feel confident and excited because you'll see what's truly possible for your music.
    
  
              

              
                  
      How long does it take to complete a song?
    
  
              
                  
      On average, at a steady pace, a song takes around one month from start to finish, completing the required step once per week. However, if you have a deadline, we can complete your track as quickly as one week! Because I want to work with dedicated musicians, there is a six-month re-start fee to protect my time and capacity in the contract.
    
  
              

              
                  
      What if I never like my song?!
    
  
              
                  
      If after giving everything to a track, you just can’t fall in love with it, I'll offer 50% off the initial payment of a new contract to start over on a brand new record.
    
  
              

              
                  
      What's your refund policy?
    
  
              
                  
      If after the first round of written feedback, you are not satisfied then I will refund the initial payment. Once the project moves beyond this stage no refund will be issued as my time has been invested. If you cancel before the end of the finishing process, you simply will not receive the final master.

How We Bring Your Music

to Life

    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      

Resonant Rhythm supports musicians at every stage of their creative journey.

Click on the stage of production you're currently going through for a guide that will spark your inspiration and propel you forward!

    
  
              


              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    Idea / Producing
                
            
        
      
    
  
              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    Arranging and Ear Candy
                
            
        
      
    
  
              


              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    Mixing / Mastering
                
            
        
      
    
  
              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    Choosing a Label or Self-Releasing
                
            
        
      
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
You're just one click away from 
breaking up with overwhelm & creative frustration
&  just a few short weeks away from 
your final masterpiece.


    
  
              
                  
      
Just imagine how you'll feel

when you press play

and those melodies roll out.

    
  
              
                  
      
From the chime of the first note of the intro
 through to the punchy vocals, 
your chart-topping song will get you (and your friends) 

dancing around your kitchen.


    
  
              
                  
      
And YOU wrote it. It's YOUR song.
All you needed was a little steering in the right direction.




    
  
              


              
                  
      

Ready to finishthat track
& turn it into a signable hit today?

    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    START YOUR PROJECT
                
            
        
      
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      'It's unbelievable how much the song has improved. Everything is much more intense, feels really expanded on the high end but the low end is still in the middle as I like. Somehow I think now I really understand what you meant you could do with the bass, like round it you said. I have been testing it in different sound systems, and I really love it.'
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
Who's behindResonant Rhythm?

    
  
              
                  

      
        

          
            
              
            
            
        
      
    
  
              


              
                  
      
I'm Keith,
a music-infatuated
 post-production technical director, 
audio engineer, and entrepreneur.

I possess an uncanny intuition for anything electronic, and I help artists create music that resonates with their audience.

Throughout my career, I have seen countless creatives stop short of their potential due to hurdles and knocked confidence at the finishing stage of their music.

 I help musicians succeed by offering my ear and feedback, technical troubleshooting, 
and advice regarding the various aspects 
of the music production process.

Believe me when I say you absolutely CAN confidently release that record as a polished, finished masterpiece. The world needs your music!

In the same way that all musicians 
release unique sounds,
 I also understand that artists 
have different needs, timescales, goals, 
and styles of working.

I always meet artists where they are at and take the time to get to know the whole story behind their music. 

When we work together I show you the necessary steps to complete your music so you can add them to your skillset and continue using them yourself moving forward.


    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      Why Work with me?
    
  
              
                  
      
My primary goal is to produce music of outstanding quality
Benefit from a wealth of experience across countless music genres
Get bespoke support tailored to YOUR creative needs 
Collaborate with an industry-lead technical and musical professional
Throughout all my years in music production, there’s not much I haven't seen in terms of roadblocks to perfecting that final mix (I also know because I've been there myself). 
you're just one step away from getting the helping hand you need to help you overcome those hurdles and finally finish that song.

    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      'I couldn't be happier with Keith's service. He provided me with very positive and in-depth feedback on my latest song, which has been incredibly helpful in improving my craft. He took the time to understand my needs and personal preferences, which made the experience feel personalized and tailored to my specific goals.'
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      Ready to make the leap?
    
  
              
                  
      Whatever your goal, Resonant Rhythm is ready to help you reach it- YOUR way. Let's work together and help you become a signed artist for your dream label today.
    
  
              
                  
      
        
          

            
                    BOOK A CALL
                
        
      
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
'I highly recommend Keith's services to anyone looking to improve their music. He is a skilled professional who truly cares about his clients, and I am grateful for the guidance he provided me.'



    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      FAQ
    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      What happens after we have our initial call?
    
  
              
                  
      
You’ll share your track and vision with me during our first call.

 If we’re a good fit to move forward, I’ll send you a contract and details to make the first payment.

 Then I'll provide a detailed document of feedback for you to get started.


    
  
              


              
                  
      What if I don't feel ready to improve my track yet?
    
  
              
                  
      
There is no time like the present! 

Often, the reason we don't feel ready to take action is because we don't have clear next steps. 

It's easy to start a project- to complete it is the real victory.

 So, if you're prepared to take a leap of faith and work together, you'll soon feel confident and excited because you'll see what's truly possible for your music.


    
  
              


              
                  
      How long does it take to complete a song?
    
  
              
                  
      
On average, at a steady pace, a song takes around one month from start to finish, completing the required step once per week.

 However, if you have a deadline, we can complete your track as quickly as one week!

 Because I want to work with dedicated musicians, there is a six-month re-start fee to protect my time and capacity in the contract.


    
  
              


              
                  
      What if I never like my song?!
    
  
              
                  
      
If after giving everything to a track, you just can’t fall in love with it, I'll offer 50% off the initial payment of a new contract to start over on a brand new record.


    
  
              


              
                  
      What's your refund policy?
    
  
              
                  
      
If after the first round of written feedback, you are not satisfied then I will refund the initial payment.

 Once the project moves beyond this stage no refund will be issued as my time has been invested. 

If you cancel before the end of the finishing process, you simply will not receive the final master.


    
  
              

      
  
      
          

              
                  
      
        
          

            
                
                    START YOUR PROJECT
                
            
        
      
    
  
              

      
  
      
  
            
      
          

              
                  
      FOLLOW US ON
    
  
              
                  
      
        
                
            
                
            
                
            
    
  
              
                  
      
Resonant Rhythm LLC © 2025
Terms & Conditions | Privacy Policy

    
  
              


              
                  
      NAVIGATION
    
  
              
                  
      
Home
What We Do
Our Process
Frequently Asked Questions 
Contact Us

    
  
              


              
                  
      CONTACTS
    
  
              
                  
      
        
          
            Sarasota, FL U.S.A.
          
        
        
                
                
                
                
                
                Click Here To Send A Message

Click Here To Book a 1 On 1 Call

metadata.title: Resonant Rhythm - Awaken the Sound of Emotion - Mixing and Mastering
metadata.description:
Emotion is the lifeblood of music. Its sound goes straight to your heart, resonates with your feelings, transports you through time and space, and deepens your experience of life.
At Resonant Rhythm, we tap into the heart of your sound through production, mixing and mastering.

[ Resonant Rhythm ](https://resonantrhythm.com/resonant-rhythm-website/home)
  * [ ](https://resonantrhythm.com/store/cart "Cart")


# You were born to make music that counts.
## Whether you've been at it for years or are newer to the game,  
sometimes a track just doesn't sound like you want it to.
### Maybe your song sounds stellar in the studio but not on your phone or in the car.
###   

### Perhaps you want to emulate a specific sound, but no matter how much you tweak things, you just can’t emulate it
###   

### You started out your production process inspired, but something is missing that you can't put your finger on.
###   

### And now you've listened to your song so many times you can no longer hear what needs improving.
###   

### All of the above can be crushingly disappointing and frustrating.
###   

### Perhaps you've sent your song to a label, only to have a reply with: "It's not quite there" or "It's not the right fit for us."
###   

# Let's Finish Your Song
![](https://content.app-sources.com/s/3541862084271912/uploads/Images/2G7A6918-Edit-4563271.jpg?format=webp)
#### I'm Keith, the face behind Resonant Rhythm, and I know what it feels like to get stuck in your creative process when crafting a hit song and not know what steps to take next.
#### 
  

  

Whether you want
#### help with mixing and mastering, 
#### an extra set of ears, 
#### or you need a boost in confidence 
#### to send your track off to your dream label, Resonant Rhythm helps musicians
####  complete their music with absolute excellence by tapping into the heart behind it and capturing in a way to move their listeners.
####   

#  Polish & Release   
in Just a Few Weeks.
The power of music to move the soul and speak to our emotions
is so mighty that just one song can create significant change in the world. 
  

With Resonant Rhythm's music finishing service, 
I come alongside artists and offer my ear 
and feedback to help artists finish tracks at their highest potential. 
  

Together, we identify the roadblocks holding them back,
then I coach the artist and make suggestions to help them complete their mix.
We then master the track until it's ready to be taken to a label or self-released.
You can also get support with mixing as an additional service if you need it.
# 
Resonant Rhythm's
Finishing Service
Go back to the basics of the original vision for your song
Polish your song's intro to a catchy label-worthy standard
Master the track until you're entirely happy with it
### Walk Away With
### 
A finished
Fully-Mastered
Hit Song
Ready to Send to Labels or to be Self-Released
  

![](https://content.app-sources.com/s/3541862084271912/uploads/Images/LogoOnly_resize-3669379.png?format=webp)
##  Is the Right Fitfor You If:
You want a personalized service 
with a professional audio engineer with over ten years of experience & exceptional technical expertise.
  

You're ready to swap feelings of 
frustration for elation, 
finish that hit song, 
and get it into the hands of a record label.
  

Musicians need tailored-to-them support
to release their unique sound into the world.
  

A holistic approach to finishing music 
means a focus on the
vision behind the song-in-progress.
  

Resonant Rhythm will help you 
create that next hit with
authenticity and meaning.
  

We'll meet virtually and evaluate your track 
using the best industry-standard audio equipment.
  

Then, throughout several remote sessions together, 
you'll receive feedback from my well-trained ear.
  

I'll coach you to implement changes 
until the production is 100% complete 
and you have a signable track
that you're wholeheartedly proud of.
With Resonant Rhythm, 
you get more than just another
conveyor-belt mediocre track.
  

Together, let's harness your vision 
for the music that resonates
with you & make it a reality
on playlists worldwide!
  

[ START YOUR PROJECT ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
#  How We Bring Your Music
# to Life
  

Resonant Rhythm supports musicians at every stage of their creative journey.
  

Click on the stage of production you're currently going through for a guide that will spark your inspiration and propel you forward!
[ Idea / Producing ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Arranging and Ear Candy ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Mixing / Mastering ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
[ Choosing a Label or Self-Releasing ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
##### You're just one click away from 
##### breaking up with overwhelm & creative frustration
& just a few short weeks away from 
your final masterpiece.
#####   

##### Just imagine how you'll feel 
when you press play 
and those melodies roll out.
##### From the chime of the first note of the intro
#####  through to the punchy vocals, 
##### your chart-topping song will get you (and your friends) 
#####  dancing around your kitchen.  

##### And YOU wrote it. It's YOUR song.
##### All you needed was a little steering in the right direction.
#####    
  

#   

# Ready to finishthat track
# & turn it into a signable hit today?
[ START YOUR PROJECT ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))

##  Who's behind

![](https://content.app-sources.com/s/3541862084271912/uploads/Images/2G7A6859-Edit-2-4563726.jpg?format=webp)
##### I'm Keith,  

##### a music-infatuated
#####  post-production technical director,

##### I possess an uncanny intuition for anything electronic, and I help artists create music that resonates with their audience.
#####   

Throughout my career, I have seen countless creatives stop short of their potential due to hurdles and knocked confidence at the finishing stage of their music.
  

I help musicians succeed by offering my ear and feedback, technical troubleshooting, 
and advice regarding the various aspects 
of the music production process.
  

Believe me when I say you absolutely CAN confidently release that record as a polished, finished masterpiece. The world needs your music!
  

In the same way that all musicians 
release unique sounds,
I also understand that artists 
have different needs, timescales, goals, 
and styles of working.
  

I always meet artists where they are at and take the time to get to know the whole story behind their music. 
  

When we work together I show you the necessary steps to complete your music so you can add them to your skillset and continue using them yourself moving forward.
  

## Why Work with me?
  * My primary goal is to produce music of outstanding quality
  * Benefit from a wealth of experience across countless music genres
  * Get bespoke support tailored to YOUR creative needs 
  * Collaborate with an industry-lead technical and musical professional
  * Throughout all my years in music production, there’s not much I haven't seen in terms of roadblocks to perfecting that final mix (I also know because I've been there myself). 
  * you're just one step away from getting the helping hand you need to help you overcome those hurdles and finally finish that song.


'I couldn't be happier with Keith's service. He provided me with very positive and in-depth feedback on my latest song, which has been incredibly helpful in improving my craft. He took the time to understand my needs and personal preferences, which made the experience feel personalized and tailored to my specific goals.'
##   
Ready to make the leap?
Whatever your goal, Resonant Rhythm is ready to help you reach it- YOUR way. Let's work together and help you become a signed artist for your dream label today.
[ BOOK A CALL ](javascript:WebPlatform.Funnels.show\('1|14'\))
'I highly recommend Keith's services to anyone looking to improve their music. He is a skilled professional who truly cares about his clients, and I am grateful for the guidance he provided me.'
  

  

# FAQ
#### What happens after we have our initial call?
You’ll share your track and vision with me during our first call.
  

If we’re a good fit to move forward, I’ll send you a contract and details to make the first payment.
  

Then I'll provide a detailed document of feedback for you to get started.
  

#### What if I don't feel ready to improve my track yet?
There is no time like the present! 
  

Often, the reason we don't feel ready to take action is because we don't have clear next steps. 
  

It's easy to start a project- to complete it is the real victory.
  

So, if you're prepared to take a leap of faith and work together, you'll soon feel confident and excited because you'll see what's truly possible for your music.
  

#### How long does it take to complete a song?
On average, at a steady pace, a song takes around one month from start to finish, completing the required step once per week.
  

However, if you have a deadline, we can complete your track as quickly as one week!
  

Because I want to work with dedicated musicians, there is a six-month re-start fee to protect my time and capacity in the contract.
  

#### What if I never like my song?!
If after giving everything to a track, you just can’t fall in love with it, I'll offer 50% off the initial payment of a new contract to start over on a brand new record.
  

#### What's your refund policy?
If after the first round of written feedback, you are not satisfied then I will refund the initial payment.
  

Once the project moves beyond this stage no refund will be issued as my time has been invested. 
  

If you cancel before the end of the finishing process, you simply will not receive the final master.

have different needs, timescales, goals, 
and styles of working.
  

I always meet artists where they are at and take the time to get to know the whole story behind their music. 
  

When we work together I show you the necessary steps to complete your music so you can add them to your skillset and continue using them yourself moving forward.
  

## Why Work with me?
  * My primary goal is to produce music of outstanding quality
  * Benefit from a wealth of experience across countless music genres
  * Get bespoke support tailored to YOUR creative needs 
  * Collaborate with an industry-lead technical and musical professional
  * Throughout all my years in music production, there’s not much I haven't seen in terms of roadblocks to perfecting that final mix (I also know because I've been there myself). 
  * you're just one step away from getting the helping hand you need to help you overcome those hurdles and finally finish that song.


'I couldn't be happier with Keith's service. He provided me with very positive and in-depth feedback on my latest song, which has been incredibly helpful in improving my craft. He took the time to understand my needs and personal preferences, which made the experience feel personalized and tailored to my specific goals.'
##   
Ready to make the leap?
Whatever your goal, Resonant Rhythm is ready to help you reach it- YOUR way. Let's work together and help you become a signed artist for your dream label today.
 BOOK A CALL ⟨9⟩)
'I highly recommend Keith's services to anyone looking to improve their music. He is a skilled professional who truly cares about his clients, and I am grateful for the guidance he provided me.'
  

  

# FAQ
#### What happens after we have our initial call?
You’ll share your track and vision with me during our first call.
  

If we’re a good fit to move forward, I’ll send you a contract and details to make the first payment.
  

Then I'll provide a detailed document of feedback for you to get started.
  

#### What if I don't feel ready to improve my track yet?
There is no time like the present! 
  

Often, the reason we don't feel ready to take action is because we don't have clear next steps. 
  

It's easy to start a project- to complete it is the real victory.
  

So, if you're prepared to take a leap of faith and work together, you'll soon feel confident and excited because you'll see what's truly possible for your music.
  

#### How long does it take to complete a song?
On average, at a steady pace, a song takes around one month from start to finish, completing the required step once per week.
  

However, if you have a deadline, we can complete your track as quickly as one week!
  

Because I want to work with dedicated musicians, there is a six-month re-start fee to protect my time and capacity in the contract.
  

#### What if I never like my song?!
If after giving everything to a track, you just can’t fall in love with it, I'll offer 50% off the initial payment of a new contract to start over on a brand new record.
  

#### What's your refund policy?
If after the first round of written feedback, you are not satisfied then I will refund the initial payment.
  

Once the project moves beyond this stage no refund will be issued as my time has been invested. 
  

If you cancel before the end of the finishing process, you simply will not receive the final master.
